dialogue.line1: Easy for you to say moron! Grrr...

dialogue.line2: No! Choose me!
No! Choose me!
dialogue.line3: Don't listen to them! Choose me!

dialogue.line2: Hello line2 test!
dialogue.line3: Hello line3 test!

dialogue.line2: What can I do for you?
Even though there isn't a weather system...

dialogue.line1: I'd like to view your stock of Ranged items.
dialogue.line2: Nothing, thanks.
Which one would you like to view?
Ranged ammunition
dialogue.line3: None, thanks.

dialogue.line2: What can I do for you?

dialogue.line1: I'd like to view my bank.
dialogue.line2: I'd like to view my PIN settings.

dialogue.line1: You do not have a bank PIN set.
dialogue.line2: Would you like to set one?
Cancel.

dialogue.line1: You currently have a bank PIN set.
dialogue.line2: Would you like to delete it?
Cancel.

dialogue.line1: Hello. I'm able to teleport you to different altars.
dialogue.line2: Which altar would you like to visit?

dialogue.line3: The Lunar altar
dialogue.line2: The Ancient altar

dialogue.line1: You're one of those adventurers, aren't you?
dialogue.line2: If you wish to sell or buy items, simply trade me.

dialogue.line1: Remember, all the items in my stock are items that
dialogue.line2: I have bought from other adventurers.
Would you like to buy some equipment?

dialogue.line1: I'd like to view your stock of Armour
dialogue.line2: I'd like to view your stock of Weapons

dialogue.line3: Did you need anything else?

I'd like to view your stock of Magical items.

Magical equipment

What can I do for you today?

dialogue.line1: I'd like to know more about the Archery minigame over there.
dialogue.line2: I'd like to view your stock of Ranged equipment.
dialogue.line3: I'd like to talk about the cape that you're wearing.

dialogue.line2: I see that you've mastered the skill! Would you like
dialogue.line3: to purchase a Ranged Skillcape for 99,000 Coins?

dialogue.line2: No

dialogue.line1: Ah yes, the Archery competition minigame.
dialogue.line2: Many talented archers come here to test their luck!

dialogue.line1: To participate, you need a Ranged level above 50,
dialogue.line2: 200 Coins, a Shortbow and at least 10 Bronze arrows.
dialogue.line3: Remember that Arrows and Bows can be bought from me.

dialogue.line1: Exchange 50 Archery Tickets for 100 Rune Arrows.
dialogue.line2: Exchange 100 Archery Tickets for 200 Rune Arrows.
dialogue.line3: Exchange X Archery Tickets for X*2 Rune Arrows

dialogue.line1: Talk to the Archer to the Southeast to start.
dialogue.line2: She will tell you that you must shoot
dialogue.line3: at a target five times in a row.

dialogue.line1: Each time you hit a target you will receive a score.
dialogue.line2: This score is eventually used to calculate your reward!
dialogue.line3: The higher score, the more Archery tickets!

dialogue.line1: Archery Tickets can be exchanged for rare weaponry.
dialogue.line2: If you need any more help, please ask a Moderator.
Take these tickets as a reward.
And what are you after?

dialogue.line1: Participte in a Archery Competition Game (200 Coins)
dialogue.line2: I'd like to spend my Archery tickets.
Select: Slayer Master
dialogue.line3: Teleport: Slayer Master

dialogue.line2: Duradel (Level 50 Slayer Required)
dialogue.line3: Kuradel (Level 80 Slayer Required)

dialogue.line2: Do you need anything?
Ask about Skillcape of Strength
dialogue.line3: Ask about Skillcape of Defence

dialogue.line2: Once you've mastered the arts of Ranged,
dialogue.line3: come talk to me! I'll sell you one!

dialogue.line1: Welcome to the Monastery, my friend!
dialogue.line2: What can I do for you?

dialogue.line1: I'd like to view your stock of Prayer items
dialogue.line2: I'd like to talk about the cape that you're wearing
dialogue.line3: I'd like you to change my Prayer book.

dialogue.line2: I believe that the Prayer Skillcape is the hardest cape
dialogue.line3: to get because it requires great devotion to the gods.

dialogue.line1: However, if you ever manage to master the skill,
dialogue.line2: come talk to me! I'll sell you a Prayer cape.
I see that you've mastered the skill! Would you like
dialogue.line3: to purchase a Prayer Skillcape for 99,000 Coins?

dialogue.line2: No
Do you need anything?

dialogue.line1: I'd like to view your stock of Magical items.
dialogue.line2: I'd like to talk about the cape that you're wearing.
dialogue.line3: I'd like you to change my Spellbook.

dialogue.line2: The Magic skill allows you to cast and use spells
dialogue.line3: to your advantage. If you manage to master it -

dialogue.line2: I'll sell you a cape like mine.
I see that you've mastered the skill! Would you like
dialogue.line3: to purchase a Magic Skillcape for 99,000 Coins?

dialogue.line2: How can I help you?

dialogue.line1: I'd like to view your stock of Runecrafting items
dialogue.line2: Could you tell me how to get Runecrafting Essence?
dialogue.line3: Could you tell me how to get to Runecrafting Altars?
dialogue.line4: I'd like to talk about the cape that you're wearing

dialogue.line1: You can teleport to an Altar by using it's Talisman's
dialogue.line2: Locate option. You can find Talismans in my shop.
The Runecrafting skill allows you to create runes.
dialogue.line3: Runes can be used for things such as Magical spells.

dialogue.line1: If you ever master the Runecrafting skill,
dialogue.line2: come talk to me. I'll sell you a cape like mine.
I see that you've mastered the skill! Would you like
dialogue.line3: to purchase a Runecrafting Skillcape for 99,000 Coins?

dialogue.line2: Teleport: Duel Arena
The Constitution skill is your @red@Life@bla@.
dialogue.line3: Higher levels mean more life points.

dialogue.line1: If you ever master the Constitution skill,
dialogue.line2: come talk to me and I'll sell you a cape like mine.
I see that you've mastered the skill! Would you like
dialogue.line3: to purchase a Constitution Skillcape for 99,000 Coins?

dialogue.line2: Many warriors come here to prove their strength!

Finish the whole course next time!

dialogue.line1: Good job on completing the course!
dialogue.line2: Take these tickets as reward.

dialogue.line1: Keep going friend! You're doing great.

dialogue.line3: Take these tickets as reward!

dialogue.line1: You are not experienced enough to wear that cape.

dialogue.line3: Feel free to use the course! It's for everyone!

dialogue.line2: How can I assist you?

dialogue.line1: I'd like to view your stock of Herblore items
dialogue.line2: How do I mix potions?
dialogue.line3: I'd like to buy a Herblore Skillcape

dialogue.line1: You mix the potion's ingredients with a Vial of Water.
dialogue.line2: For example, if I were to mix an Attack Potion, the two
dialogue.line3: ingredients would be an Eye of Newt and a Clean Guam.

dialogue.line1: A potion's special ingredients can be found in
dialogue.line2: the Ingridient's book, which is sold in my store.

dialogue.line1: My stock currently only contains basic herbs.
dialogue.line2: If you'd like better, you'll have to get them yourself from
dialogue.line3: either the Farming skill, or from mobs like Chaos Druids.

dialogue.line1: Well.. How can I help you?
I'd like to view your stock of Mining equipment
dialogue.line2: I'd like to buy a Mining Skillcape

dialogue.line1: Sorry pal, you'll have to mine some more ores first.
Wear the cape with pride, pal.
Can you show me your stock of Crafting items?

Well fought, JalYt, take these tokens as a reward.
You even defeated TzTok-Jad, I am most impressed!
dialogue.line2: Please take this gift as a reward.

dialogue.line1: Woah, you are a true warrior! I guess you want more!
dialogue.line2: I've set up the cyclopses to drop Dragon Defenders.
dialogue.line3: Enter through the doors when ready.

dialogue.line2: Only the finest warriors can enter my arena!
dialogue.line3: Come back when you have 200 points.

dialogue.line1: You've found a hidden tunnel! Would you like to enter?

dialogue.line2: Cancel

dialogue.line1: So you want to start earning some defenders?

dialogue.line3: Enter through the doors when ready

dialogue.line2: The following features are disabled within the arena:
dialogue.line3: Summoning, Ring of Life, and Phoenix necklace.

dialogue.line1: Please! You must help me, adventurer!
dialogue.line2: The Culinaromancer is back!
What's happened?
He appeared at the dinner last night and froze the room!
dialogue.line3: Luckily I managed to escape before he cast the spell..

dialogue.line2: In order to lift the spell, the Culinaromancer
dialogue.line3: must be defeated.. Sadly, I'm just a Cook..

dialogue.line1: Enter the room to the north and you will find a portal.
dialogue.line2: Enter the portal and gain the Culinaromancer's attention
dialogue.line3: by defeating any mobs that spawn.

dialogue.line1: Once you've defeated all of them, the Culinaromancer
dialogue.line2: will fight you himself. Defating him will lift the spell.

dialogue.line1: Every boss that you defeat will unlock deeper access
dialogue.line2: into the Culinaromancer's chest, found in the basement.
No, maybe later.
I wish you the best of luck.

dialogue.line1: It appears that the Cook was telling the truth!
dialogue.line2: I must rescue them.
dialogue.line3: I wonder what's inside that portal..

dialogue.line2: You defeated the Culinaromancer!
dialogue.line3: Thank you so much!

dialogue.line1: Remember that you now have full access
dialogue.line2: to the Culinaromancer's chest!
dialogue.line3: You can find it in the basement.

dialogue.line2: Go Downstairs
dialogue.line3: Neither

dialogue.line1: This is Daemonheim. You can train Dungeoneering here.
dialogue.line2: Dungeoneering allows you to explore dungeons.
dialogue.line3: After exploring a dungeon, you are given tokens.
dialogue.line4: These tokens can be spent on good rewards!

dialogue.line2: If you have any questions, feel free to ask

dialogue.line2: I'd like to view your shop

dialogue.line1: Good luck friend. By the way, I've given you a Gatestone.
dialogue.line2: Drop it on the ground and then use

dialogue.line1: What can I do for you?
I'd like to buy a Construction Skillcape

dialogue.line3: I'd like to view your shop

dialogue.line1: Sorry pal. You already have a house.

dialogue.line1: Yes, buy a house for 50,000 coins

dialogue.line1: Thank you mate. You now have a house.
dialogue.line2: You can build objects in it and you can also
dialogue.line3: invite your friends in!
dialogue.line4: You can find most building material in my shop.

dialogue.line1: Sorry pal. You don't seem to have the money on you.

dialogue.line2: You failed to seal all the portals in time.
dialogue.line3: Better luck next time!

dialogue.line2: You successfully closed the rifts!
dialogue.line3: You have received 5 Commendations and some coins.

dialogue.line1: Your task is to defend the Void knight while

The pit is now under your hand.

dialogue.line1: Sorry pal, only Donators can go there. You

dialogue.line3: also buy Donator Points which you can spend on items.

dialogue.line2: This area contains some features that
dialogue.line3: normal players cannot access.

dialogue.line1: Adventurer! Please note that if you
dialogue.line2: die here, no gravestone will be created
dialogue.line3: and all of your items will be lost forever!
dialogue.line4: This area has been cursed by Zaros.

dialogue.line1: Hello there. What can I do for you?
I'd like to know more about that chest over there
dialogue.line2: I'd like to buy a Thieving Skillcape
dialogue.line3: Nothing, thanks

dialogue.line1: That my friend, is a expensive Mahogany
dialogue.line2: chest. Every 24 hours, I refill it with
dialogue.line3: stolen goods for young thieves to loot.

dialogue.line4: Simply climb down the ladder to begin.

dialogue.line1: It is a currency which can be used

dialogue.line3: these points by killing monsters in the

I'd like to enter the lottery!
dialogue.line3: How much is the pot at right now?
dialogue.line4: Who won the lottery last week?

dialogue.line1: It costs 300.000 coins to enter the lottery.
dialogue.line2: Every Friday, one of the contesters will win the
dialogue.line3: entire pot of gold and another lottery will begin. If
dialogue.line4: you have any questions, feel free to ask other contesters.

dialogue.line1: You have already entered this week's
dialogue.line2: lottery.
dialogue.line3: The winner is announced every Friday.

dialogue.line2: lottery.
dialogue.line3: The winner is announced every Friday.

dialogue.line1: You need to be in a Dungeoneering party to begin.
dialogue.line2: Either join one or start your own by using a
dialogue.line3: Ring of Kinship which can be found in my shop.

dialogue.line1: Your party hasn't selected which floor to explore.
dialogue.line2: Let me know once you are settled.

dialogue.line1: Oh wow! You don't have a valid email adress set.
dialogue.line2: Please set one so you can recover your password!
dialogue.line3: You can set an email using the Shortcuts interface.

dialogue.line1: Welcome! Feel free to check out my shop! I sell
dialogue.line2: exclusive items which can be found nowhere else
dialogue.line3: on Trident! Simply trade me to get started.

dialogue.line1: You have not chosen a game difficulty yet.
dialogue.line2: Which difficulty do you wish to play with?
Normal
dialogue.line3: Hard

dialogue.line1: I've attempted to open up www.Trident-ps.com/difficulties
dialogue.line2: for you. If it does not open, please visit it manually
dialogue.line3: by typing the URL into your browser's address bar.

dialogue.line1: I can also change your game difficulty.
dialogue.line2: So, what do you need?
Could you reset my game difficulty?
dialogue.line3: Nothing, thanks!

dialogue.line1: But your stats will be reset and your account
dialogue.line2: will be removed from the highscores. Would
dialogue.line3: you like me to change your difficulty anyway?

dialogue.line2: No thanks.
Summoning: Charms

dialogue.line1: Hi. If you've got any Energy fragments,

dialogue.line1: Are you sure that you wish to empty your
dialogue.line2: inventory? If yes, all your items inside of
dialogue.line3: it will disappear forever, and you will not
dialogue.line4: be able to get them back once deleted.

dialogue.line2: No thanks!
Here, you will find the most delicious fish.
dialogue.line3: If you wish to fish bigger fish, you can do so
dialogue.line4: in Catherby, at the fishing aquariums.

dialogue.line2: will reset all of your items and levels.
